file_content.text: Don't keep Ardun waiting.
Our lovely Imperial heroine.
Our Imperial hero-with-a-conscience.
You just destroyed your own government's billion-credit initiative. How does treason make you feel?
Who are these people?
What's going on here?
I did what I had to.
I'm a professional. I focus on the job... whatever side I'm working for.
My feelings aren't relevant.
Never mind him--he likes to give new agents a hard time.
Let me introduce you to your team--this is code name: Saber.
Four years sniper training. We should swap stories.
Code name: Chance, who you talked to....
Slicing and mission control. Joining us was the right decision, sir.
...and code name: Wheel. Our technology specialist.
Charmed.
You don't know how proud I am to work with you. All of you.
It's an honor to be here.
Feeling's mutual. I can't imagine the strength it took to come over.
We could all stand to reflect on that.
I came to speak to Ardun Kothe. He does still run this team?
Where's the man in charge?
I do, yes.
If I knew this was your best, I wouldn't have defected.
This is all you've got?
Tone it down. They're good people.
Sir.
Ardun Kothe, head of division. See me in my office when you're done.
The rest of you--finish up and get to work. There's a war going on.
And like a ghost, he passes through. Probably should do what he says.
I want this job done by morning, or you'll never meet my superiors.
A woman like you deserves to see the city from above. Don't you think?
My husband owns his own starship.
But he doesn't fly like me. Come by later.
She didn't finish her drink. Can I interest you in what's left of a Cassandra Sunrise?
I came looking for a friend. Maybe you know him.
I'm here for a meeting.
I can be your friend.
Friend might be stretching it.
Buy us a bottle, and we can start fresh.
[Flirt] Maybe something else.
I like you. Too bad, really.
I can buy my own drinks.
No thank you.
Well, more for the staff, then.
I have business here. Run along.
Get out of my face.
Of course. I'll go wait for that Cipher agent somewhere else, unless--wait....
Code name Hunter, Strategic Information Service. I hear you want to switch sides.
No sob stories, no questions. You do us a favor, and then you meet your new employers.
Agreed.
You aren't going to confirm my identity?
Just like that?
I did that as soon as you stepped onto this moon. It's why I had time to kill with my lady friend.
Besides, I don't trust your motives anyway. I don't have to--that'll be my superiors' call.
Try me out on a mission, then assess my performance. Is that it?
This is the first test, then.
That's it.
Trust or not, you know what I could be worth to you.
But you still need me.
I see the potential. But first things first.
Are your superiors this arrogant, too?
You really are obnoxious.
Most people say I'm charming. I guess would-be Imperial traitors bring out the worst in me.
I need the man in charge--not his lackey.
Where's Ardun Kothe?
That's not how it works. Trust is earned over time, not with a few palmed files.
A new droid factory opened up recently, thanks to the Empire's latest partnership with Nem'ro the Hutt.
Supposed to manufacture hunters, crawlers, Jedi-killers... all the best. You're going to do something about it.
It's been a while, but I could ask Nem'ro nicely to shut it down.
The Hutts and I go way back.
Tempting, but I have something else in mind.
Becoming a double agent is one thing. Killing Imperials is another.
I can't just fight my people!
Spare me. I'm not asking you to shoot the place up.
Give me a location and enough thermal detonators... and it's done.
How about I blow it up?
Maybe. But then you're branded a traitor and we're out a double agent. Hardly worth the trouble.
Security's tight but automated. You can use Cipher clearance to get inside; then step one is reconnaissance.
I'll tell you the next step when I know what you're up against. Deal?
I'll go in and wait for your signal.
It's a deal.
Excellent. I look forward to working with you.
Suppose someone notices me. What then?
What if I'm caught?
Then I suppose you get executed for crimes against the Empire. You'd know better than me.
You'd better get moving. I don't have all night.
Before I do anything, I need some guarantees.
I have conditions...
Too bad. You're not going to get them.
I have your comm frequency, and I'll send you the factory location. If you're not there within the hour, your dealings with the SIS are over....
...and your dream of "defecting" is dead.
Is there a reason we're talking?
Not bad at all. I'm sending you new coordinates. Once you've landed, we'll meet you there.
You should know we were able to evacuate the area. No casualties--perfect score.
Code name Wheel speaking. Electrical buildup has reached critical levels.
Cipher! Factory doors are sealing.
Relax. There's a speeder pad close by. Move fast enough, and you might even make it.
Code name Wheel speaking. At Hunter's request, I am monitoring the power buildup in the factory. You are on target for a controlled electrical storm; proceed with caution.
Watch your pretty hands. Survive this mission, and we might use you again.
Be careful with that thing. Survive this mission, and you might still be useful.
If you're receiving this, I assume you're still alive. We have our intel, and the databanks have been wiped.
Now I want the whole factory taken down. You're going to overload the electrical systems from the emergency panels. Sending locations now.
You're doing great. I'm going to wipe the databanks, and it'll just be a few seconds more.
Hey! SIS! You think we're loyal yet? You need me to blast more droids? Yeah, okay....
We hope this is earning us trust, agent. We're certainly working for it!
Cipher? This is code name Chance. I've got the droid schematics. Now Hunter wants me to dig deeper.
But it means triggering an alarm. Droids'll be all over your location.
Hold them off as long as you can. I'll alert you as soon as I'm done.
That's enough. Headquarters can analyze the recon data, but you have another task.
I want the blueprints to those droids. Get to the main computer and hook us in; I'll have my slicer contact you.
They're building cortosis-plated droids. Lightsaber resistant. Keep looking around.
Cipher. You made it inside. Proceed with the recon.
